# File lib/innate/node.rb, line 86
    def self.generate_mapping(object_name = self.name)
      return '/' if NODE_LIST.size == 1
      parts = object_name.split('::').map{|part|
        part.gsub(/^[A-Z]+/){|sub| sub.downcase }.gsub(/[A-Z]+[^A-Z]/, '_\&')
      }
      '/' << parts.join('/').downcase
    end
